attributes.additional_details:
Allocate 1 or 2 locations within the UK for a spaceport one in the south and one in the North of the UK Or extend runways at 2 existing airports to accomidate the launch of craft capable of flying in to low earth orbit / space

This would allow Virigin galatcic / skylon craft and or other british companies that have plans to produce craft to launch these craft from the UK (providing more jobs and money to the UK economy)
